QuestData.Title: Fragments of Disaster
QuestData.Description:
In the hall beyond rests the bones of the failed arcan'dor.
I will take fragments of the crystallized tree and attempt to read them. We must discover the root cause of this destruction.
Only then do we have any hope of preventing this disaster from repeating itself.
QuestData.RewardText: I will study these carefully. If we are fortunate, there will be answers.

Objectives.Objective: Return to the Temple of Fal'adora
